post:
Hi guys,

We were supposed to post these on the 4th of July....but here we are almost a month later :)

<br>

Storage (only available in Chicago - and very limited quantity):

<pre>
1x 2.4+ GHz
512 MB RAM
250 GB disk
1 TB bandwidth
$15 per year
Pay for two years (+$7) - get doubled RAM and +9 TB free bandwidth
https://manage.hosthatch.com/billing/order/chi-250g-storage
</pre>

Bundles:

<pre>
Choose any 7 locations, 1 VM per location:

1 CPU core (12.5% dedicated, burstable up to 100%)
1 GB RAM
10 GB RAID-10 NVMe
1 TB bandwidth
$65 per year

To order, login to your account with us, top up the credit, and open a sales ticket with the 7 locations of your choosing.
</pre>


<pre>
All locations bundle, 1 VM per location:

1 CPU core (12.5% dedicated, burstable up to 100%)
1 GB RAM
10 GB RAID-10 NVMe
1 TB bandwidth
$110 per year

To order, login to your account with us, top up the credit, and open a sales ticket.
</pre>

<br>

Our looking glasses are available at https://hosthatch.com/features (if some are not available - please open a ticket to ask for test information). 

We also have a status page that shows the past uptime of our networks - https://status.hosthatch.com/

Setup time for these plans is 3 working days after the order/payment has been completed.

<br>

The order URLs will automatically be disabled on the 10th of August, or earlier if a particular plan/location is out of stock.

Thank you!
